description: Django custom template tags module defining an inclusion tag 'button' for rendering accessible, customizable UI buttons with various styles, icons, and states.

methods.name: Dict button( button_label: str, href: Optional[str] = None, variant: str = "primary", size: str = "md", icon_left: Optional[str] = None, icon_right: Optional[str] = None, disabled: bool = False, loading: bool = False, id: Optional[str] = None, extra_classes: str = "", type: str = "button", name: Optional[str] = None, value: Optional[str] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, aria_label: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Creates context data for rendering a reusable, accessible button or anchor element with customizable parameters such as label, variants, icons, states, and HTML attributes.

ctags.name: button
ctags.signature: ( button_label: str, href: Optional[str] = None, variant: str = "primary", size: str = "md", icon_left: Optional[str] = None, icon_right: Optional[str] = None, disabled: bool = False, loading: bool = False, id: Optional[str] = None, extra_classes: str = "", type: str = "button", name: Optional[str] = None, value: Optional[str] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, aria_label: Optional[str] = None, )
